user_profile.name: Carlos Mendoza
user_profile.description: Carlos Mendoza is a 67-year-old retired engineer from Brazil, known for his outgoing personality and professional communication style. With advanced tech skills and a background in visual learning, Carlos enjoys exploring new opportunities, particularly in finding an accessible home that suits his athletic lifestyle. Despite being impulsive in decision-making, he remains adaptable and is eager to leverage his flexible schedule to ensure he finds the perfect fit in a mixed social environment.

instructions.dialogue: Express only basic needs, let the assistant ask questions.
instructions.profile: Gradually reveal your profile information throughout the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express moderate emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local real estate agency or online platforms like Zillow
